documents.document: What does it say about me that I'm on the Wizard's side in "Emerald City"?
Call us racists all you want my dear progressives, you've made that term so devoid of meaning that no one cares anymore.
The left is discovering to their peril that making ideas social unacceptable does not erase them from existence.
Oh, that tattoo is an expression of your inner self? I guess your inner self enjoys working as a busboy.
@JessMorganTO I've written on the subject at length in my blog.
The reChristianization of the West is its only true hope. The secular must be desecularized. The rational replaced with the supernatural.
If the left has made anything crystal clear over these last few years, it is that no compromise, no concession, will ever satisfy them.
Where were all these brave "protestors" from Berkley when ISIS death worshiping fascists began slaughtering Christians across Iraq & Syria?
What the alt-right is is a symptom of the fact the modern world is broken.

So the DOW broke 20,000 today for the first time in history. Guess we're still waiting for that Trump-induced stock market crash.
For the first time I can ever remember, progressives are not just angry, they are afraid.
Never fear a man who speaks plainly. It's the ones who smile & nod you should always question.
Don't kid yourself, fascism is just socialism with race taking the place of the worker.
Do you truly want your legacy when you leave this world to just be that you once won Employee of the Month.
Will that promotion to lower management in your fifties come visit you in the seniors' home? Doubt it.
Does pushing paper in some office cubicle REALLY give more satisfaction than bringing new life into the world & helping it come to maturity?
Sadly, 95% of us will spend our lives in utter insignificance professionally speaking. So ladies, why not spend that time raising children.
If the clothes don't fit. Don't wear them.
Sex is great. It's even better with your lawfully married partner.
